<!-- Addin Import -->
xmlns:ma="urn:import:gwt.material.design.addins.client"
<!-- Addin Usage -->
<ma:richeditor.MaterialRichEditor placeholder="Type everything about Material Design"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Set/Get HTML
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provided a method to easily set the html content of the rich editor component

m:MaterialTitle.title: Air mode
m:MaterialTitle.description: Air-mode gives clearer interface with hiddened toolbar. To reveal toolbar, select a text where you want to shape up. Simply turn on airMode and just focus on text.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Height
m:MaterialTitle.description: The height param applied to Editor's zone

m:MaterialTitle.title: Controlling Options
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set Options and remove what you want or even place it. Options style, fonts, colors, undo, ckMedia, misc, para and height are placed respectively.
